devices_connect.message_setup_device: Press the configuration button until the status LED turns between green and red. When the mobile data LED blinks, press the devices search button
devices_connect.message_no_devices: Devices not found, please make sure the mobile data LED blinks, and press the devices search button again.
devices_connect.message_nowifi: You must enable WiFi to configure CTI devices

list_wifi.title: Choose a WiFi
list_wifi.message_explain: You can select which network you want to connect the device to

close_connection.title: Close the connection to the device
close_connection.message_explain: Are you sure you want to disconnect from the device?

find_devices.title: CTI Setup
find_devices.message_subtext: With this app you can configure your device
find_devices.premissions_needed: CTI Setup needs permission to connect to the device
find_devices.premissions_needed_details: Please press the Request Permission button and accept the permission to connect to the device

setup_device.title: CTI Setup - Configuration
setup_device.label_wifi: The device is configured by WiFi
setup_device.label_data: The device is configured by the SIM Card
setup_device.error_communication: An error occured while connecting with the device

setup_device_wifi.title: CTI Setup - WiFi Configuration
setup_device_wifi.message_new_configuration: Please select the WiFi network you want to connect this device to. You must provide the SSID and the password.
setup_device_wifi.invalid_ssid: SSID cannot be more than 16 characters
setup_device_wifi.invalid_passwd_size: Password cannot be more than 32 characters
setup_device_wifi.message_saved_ko: Error saving new configuration, please try again

setup_device_data.title: CTI Setup - SIM Configuration
setup_device_data.message_need_puk: SIM card is PUK-locked, please insert an unlocked SIM card.
setup_device_data.message_auto_configuration: Please select whether you want to set automatic or manual configuration
setup_device_data.message_saving_fails: Error saving configuration, please check configuration
setup_device_data.message_no_4g: You must insert a SIM Card to use a data connection; if there is a SIM card, it may take a few seconds to load the configuration, please wait or go back to the previous screen

validate_configuration.title: CTI Setup - Verify Configuration
validate_configuration.label: Checking the configuration
validate_configuration.validating: Comprobando la conexi√≥n al servidor CTIportal, por favor, espere...
validate_configuration.done_server: The device is transmitting to the CTIportal server, its last communication was
validate_configuration.failed_internet: Unable to connect to the Internet, please connect to a valid network and try again
validate_configuration.failed_server: Could not connect to the Internet. To check if the device is transmitting with the CTIportal server, the status LED should be green
validate_configuration.failed_server_tx: The device is not communicating with the server. Maybe it's still processing the configuration, please check if the status LED is green or try again

change_device_password.label: Change password
change_device_password.title: CTI Setup - Change Password
change_device_password.message: This action will change the password to access your device; if you continue, the next access to your device must enter the new password
change_device_password.hint_repasswd: insert the same password as above
change_device_password.error_saving: An error occurred while saving the new password, please check the device and try it again
change_device_password.saving: Changing the password, please wait a moment
change_device_password.save_ok: The password has been changed successfully, the next access to your device remember to enter the new password

reset_device.label: Factory Reset
reset_device.title: CTI Setup - Reset Device
reset_device.reset: The device will be reset to factory configuration
reset_device.reset_advise: All previous configurations will be lost and the device will be reboot. You will need to reconnect with the device to start a new configuration
reset_device.reseting: Resetting... Please wait until all LEDs blink green
reset_device.error: The reset has been failed. Maybe the connection is lost, please check the device and repeat the process
reset_device.reset_ok: The device has been restored to factory configuration, you must reconnect with the device to start a new configuration

languages.title: CTI Setup - Languages
languages.message_select: Select the language you want to use

disconnect.title: CTI Setup - Device Disconnected
disconnect.message_disconnect: The device has been disconnected through the app
disconnect.message_disconnecting: Closing the connection to the device, please wait a moment...

wifi_credentials.title: CTI Setup - Connect to Device
wifi_credentials.error_connecting: Cannot connect to the device, please check if the status LED blinks between green and red, and/or the password is correct

configuration_type_selector.title: CTI Setup - Connection Type
configuration_type_selector.dialog_explain: Enter a name to identify this configuration or leave it blank
configuration_type_selector.input_hint_name: Enter a name or left blank

xiaomi_perm.title: CTI Setup - Enable Permission
xiaomi_perm.message_details1: In order to a better experience, please press the button "GO TO PERMISSIONS"

wifi.title: Location permission required
wifi.message: This app needs location permission to access WiFi networks

api.message_error: Cannot retrieve device configuration, please check the device and its connection
api.message_error_post: Cannot save device configuration, please check the device and its connection
